get.summary:
GetAccount retrieves information about an account based on the provided
address.

GetBlock retrieves information about a block based on the provided request
parameters.
GetBlockHash retrieves the hash of a block at the specified height.
GetBlockHeight retrieves the height of a block with the specified hash.
GetBlockchainInfo retrieves general information about the blockchain.
GetConsensusInfo retrieves information about the consensus instances.

GetPublicKey retrieves the public key of an account based on the provided
address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address for which public key is requested.

get.summary:
GetValidator retrieves information about a validator based on the provided
address.

GetValidatorByNumber retrieves information about a validator based on the
provided number.
GetNetworkInfo retrieves information about the overall network.
GetNodeInfo retrieves information about a specific node in the network.

put.summary: BroadcastTransaction broadcasts a signed transaction to the network.

get.summary:
CalculateFee calculates the transaction fee based on the specified amount
and payload type.
GetRawBondTransaction retrieves raw details of a bond transaction.
GetRawTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of a transfer transaction.
GetRawUnBondTransaction retrieves raw details of an unbond transaction.

parameters.name: validatorAddress
parameters.description: Address of the validator to unbond from.

get.summary: GetRawWithdrawTransaction retrieves raw details of a withdraw transaction.

parameters.name: validatorAddress
parameters.description: Address of the validator to withdraw from.

parameters.name: accountAddress
parameters.description: Address of the account to withdraw to.

get.summary:
GetTransaction retrieves transaction details based on the provided request
parameters.
CreateWallet creates a new wallet with the specified parameters.

GetValidatorAddress retrieves the validator address associated with a
public key.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: Public key for which the validator address is requested.

get.summary: LoadWallet loads an existing wallet with the given name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: Name of the wallet to load.

get.summary:
LockWallet locks a currently loaded wallet with the provided password and
timeout.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: Name of the wallet to lock.

get.summary: SignRawTransaction signs a raw transaction for a specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: Name of the wallet used for signing.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for unlocking the wallet for signing.

parameters.name: rawTransaction
parameters.description: Raw transaction data to be signed.

get.summary: UnloadWallet unloads a currently loaded wallet with the specified name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: Name of the wallet to unload.

get.summary:
UnlockWallet unlocks a locked wallet with the provided password and
timeout.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: Name of the wallet to unlock.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Timeout duration for the unlocked state.

pactusAccountInfo.description: Message containing information about an account.

proposerAddress.description: Address of the proposer of the block.

pactusBlockHeaderInfo.description: Message containing information about the header of a block.

pactusBlockVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity level when requesting block information.

 - BLOCK_DATA: Request block data only.
 - BLOCK_INFO: Request block information only.
 - BLOCK_TRANSACTIONS: Request block transactions only.

pactusBroadcastTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing the ID of the broadcasted transaction.

pactusCalculateFeeResponse.description: Response message containing the calculated transaction fee.

committers.description: List of committers in the certificate.

absentees.description: List of absentees in the certificate.

pactusCertificateInfo.description: Message containing information about a certificate.

Active.description: Whether the consensus instance is active.

votes.description: List of votes in the consensus instance.

pactusCreateWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the created wallet.

pactusGetAccountResponse.description: Message containing the response with account information.

pactusGetBlockHashResponse.description: Message containing the response with the block hash.

pactusGetBlockHeightResponse.description: Message containing the response with the block height.

txs.description: List of transactions in the block.

pactusGetBlockResponse.description: Message containing the response with block information.

pactusGetBlockchainInfoResponse.description: Message containing the response with general blockchain information.

pactusGetConsensusInfoResponse.description: Message containing the response with consensus information.

totalSentBytes.description: Total bytes sent across the network.

totalReceivedBytes.description: Total bytes received across the network.

pactusGetNetworkInfoResponse.description: Response message containing information about the overall network.

services.description: List of services provided by the node.

servicesNames.description: Names of services provided by the node.

addrs.description: List of addresses associated with the node.

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the node.

pactusGetNodeInfoResponse.description: Response message containing information about a specific node in the network.

pactusGetPublicKeyResponse.description: Message containing the response with the public key.

pactusGetRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing raw transaction data.

blockHeight.description: Height of the block containing the transaction.

blockTime.description: Time of the block containing the transaction.

pactusGetTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing details of a transaction.

address.description: Validator address associated with the public key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressResponse.description:
Response message containing the validator address corresponding to a public
key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressesResponse.description: Message containing the response with a list of validator addresses.

pactusGetValidatorResponse.description: Message containing the response with validator information.

pactusLoadWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the loaded wallet.

pactusLockWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the locked wallet.

pactusPayloadType.description:
Enumeration for different types of transaction payloads.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown payload type.
 - TRANSFER_PAYLOAD: Transfer payload type.
 - BOND_PAYLOAD: Bond payload type.
 - SORTITION_PAYLOAD: Sortition payload type.
 - UNBOND_PAYLOAD: Unbond payload type.
 - WITHDRAW_PAYLOAD: Withdraw payload type.

validator.description: Address of the validator to unbond from.

consensusKeys.description: Consensus keys used by the peer.

lastBlockHash.description: Hash of the last block the peer knows.

height.description: Height of the peer in the blockchain.

lastSent.description: Timestamp of the last sent message.

lastReceived.description: Timestamp of the last received message.

direction.description: Direction of connection with the peer.

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the peer.

pactusPeerInfo.description: Information about a peer in the network.

pactusSignRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing the transaction ID and signed raw transaction.

publicKey.description: Public key associated with the transaction.

pactusTransactionVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity level when requesting transaction details.

 - TRANSACTION_DATA: Request only transaction data.
 - TRANSACTION_INFO: Request detailed transaction information.

pactusUnloadWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the unloaded wallet.

pactusUnlockWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the unlocked wallet.

pactusValidatorInfo.description: Message containing information about a validator.

blockHash.description: Hash of the block being voted on.

pactusVoteInfo.description: Message containing information about a vote.

pactusVoteType.description:
Enumeration for types of votes.

 - VOTE_UNKNOWN: Unknown vote type.
 - VOTE_PREPARE: Prepare vote type.
 - VOTE_PRECOMMIT: Precommit vote type.
 - VOTE_CHANGE_PROPOSER: Change proposer vote type.
